issue.title: Task-3 Steps are uneven and to small

content.raw:
Hi @sringer99, thank you for the suggestions.

If you look at various sources besides the one you linked, you'll find that the current step sizes (0.21m height x 0.24m depth) are within common standards.

You're right, Val's feet are a bit larger than the steps, but she is able to stand on them even with the toe kick:

![valfeet.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3023480910-valfeet.png)

So we think teams should be able to handle the stairs the way they are right now, including the different step sizes.
